dmca.title: DMCA notice to ThePlanet.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

 

Please visit our web site at  <http://www.theplanet.com/legal>
www.theplanet.com/legal.

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Davey [mailto:dorkland1@mchsi.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 28, 2006 12:40 AM
To: legal-response@theplanet.com
Subject: 


i run two servers on call of duty under the name of Dorf's War and Dorfs
War2 so today i find a server being hosted by you guys who copied my name
and all the info on my server...this needs to be either shut down or a name
change or i will have to take this to my attorney...the server address is
67.19.28.69:28960...you would prob be better off shutting them down cause
who wants to rent to stupid people....
